name: Not Clowning Around
description:
DISCLAIMER:

Wacky video game clown suicide is a joke. Real suicide isn't. The National Suicide Prevention Hotline is 1-800-273-8255 if you're in America or visit https://www.iasp.info/resources/Crisis_Centres/ if you're outside America. There's someone that can talk to you right now.

DISCLAIMER 2:

This game is a work of fiction! A Tom Collins without soda water is just a modified Gin Gimlet! Don't let anyone tell you otherwise!

IF YOU LIKE IT, VOTE FOR IT AT LUDUM DARE!

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/not-clowning-around
A clown walks into a bar... except this is no laughing matter! He's got a gun to his head! Oh jeez! You've gotta talk this clown down!

Fix him a drink, see what he likes!

Throw the drink at him, you're not getting anywhere near a clown with a gun!

Give him some sage advice and a ear to talk to! Better not be insincere!

And just pray... PRAY... that the cops show up before anything happens!

A GAME BY WILSON TAYLOR

Check out my other games, also available on Itch and follow me on Twitter at @MrFistSalad!
